xmlText.p: First Period_1, Philadelphia, Konecny 7 (Laughton, Gostisbehere), 3:29. 2, Philadelphia, Filppula 10 (Raffl, Gudas), 8:30. 3, Philadelphia, Provorov 9 (Konecny, Giroux), 12:15.
